descriptionHtml:
[color=DarkSeaGreen]Tunic of Legolas[/color]

[color=Orange]For many times people reporting me the same problems they have when installing with and without NMM, but after my reply it works again, those problems doesn't exist at all in my mods, its happening from their mistake, did not get all the files they need and did wrong installation.
On the other hand, they may not read the description at all, NOT MY PROBLEM!
So pay attention because i wont reply anymore for the same subject!

1) First you need to install the Main File and then the Update File, NOT just the Update File!!!
2) On NMM while overriding a file over the other, it says you "A different version of **** has been detected. The installed version is, the new version is.",
and it asks you "Would you like to upgrade?", also it says you "Selecting NO it will the new Mod normally", you should click NO and not YES, it will keep the main file and will replace the update files over the main file.

Its not hard to do it so! oo[/color]

[color=red][[[@To all
If you have issues like that the mod is not working, that the tunic is invisible, that the tunic doesn't show up in blacksmith or anything else, now i explain what you all do wrong, because i tested and the mod is working great like to all other people who installed it corectly and works great to them too!

What you make wrong is:
You downloaded only the Update File "LegolasTunic" and installed it, but not first the Main File "Legolas_Tunic"!

Why you have those issues:
Because the Main File contains the Meshes and Textures of the tunic, also the esp file does not have armor rate and its my mistake.

What you have to do is:
You must first install the Main File and then the Update File to replace the old esp with the new esp, the esp in Update File is fixing the armor rate.

Where are the tunic and cape in blacksmith:
The tunic is in the Leather section or in Misc section, but the cape is in Misc section.

If you will install like i say, then it will work like to all other people works.]]][/color]

Author:
haldir307

Description:
The green tunic of Legolas which is made in Mirkwood.
I retextured the nightingale armor, remade the meshes,
renamed the armor and replaced the symbol with the mirkwood's.
Its standalone, craftable in leather section of blacksmith.
**Now and female version, sorry for delay, i had an issue in CK which now it's fixed.**
If you want his bow, you can find it here:
Isilmeriel LOTR Weapons Collection
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5727

Installation:
**For those who already have the first version, please uninstall it before install the new version!
How? Delete the LegolasTunic.esp in Data, delete the folder legolas in Datameshesarmor
and delete the folder legolas in Datatexturesarmor.**
**For those who are using the currently new version for first time, extract the file
and copy the folder "Data" to Program FilesSteamSteamAppscommonskyrim**

Run SkyrimLauncher, click to Data Files and checkmark the empty box of the LegolasTunic.esp,
checkmark the empty box of Load Loose Files and click OK.

Attention please, if the Data Files section is grey and isn't working, go to this directory:
C:Users****DocumentsMy GamesSkyrim
and open SkyrimPrefs.ini, find the [Launcher] and type under of the last line,
those two lines exactly like they are:
bEnableFileSelection=1
bLoadLooseFiles=1
Save and close it, go back to SkyrimLauncher and enable the checkmarks i told before,
you are ready to enjoy the Tunic of Legolas.

Permissions:
1) Users/Modders are not allowed to upload my files to other sites!
2) Users/Modders are not allowed to convert my file so that it works on similar games!
3) Users/Modders are not allowed to modify my file including releasing bug fixes or improving on the features my file adds to the game and upload it as a seperate file!
4) Users/Modders are not allowed to use assets contained in my files in their own files!
[b][i]5) Translations are allowed, no need to ask me.Â 
[b][i][u]6) Users/Modders are not allowed to upload my mods on Steam Workshop as their own to obtain money and it means the same for Permissions 2/3/4, my mods will always stay on nexus for free![/u][/i][/b][/i][/b]

Credits:
Made by haldir307.
